title: Ai-san’s Day!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Today is your day, Ai-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eh? My birthday was the day before yesterday, though?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You’re not wrong, but today is also your day. Because today is “Idea Day”!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eeeeh!? There’s a day for that!? Idea day, huh~.... Cause it’s “Aidea”, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, that’s right.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Then, should we come up with an idea for our next live? Ai will give you an amazing idea~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Sure, what kind of live would it be?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>A live where everyone is the star of the show! For your stage, we could show backgrounds that match the songs on the monitor. That way, everyone could enjoy a theater-like atmosphere. Wouldn’t that be nice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Waaah, I’d love to try that! What else, what else!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Wawaah, Shizuku! Calm down!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
